description:
A cross-platform IDE for C and C++

A powerful IDE from JetBrains helps you develop in C and C++ on Linux, macOS and Windows.
The CLion 2024.2.2 bug-fix update is now available.
The highlights include:
- A process leak during test list preparation has been fixed.
- Symbolic breakpoints are back in the CLion Nova debugger.
- CLion Nova now supports Clang-Tidy checks in C projects.
Please share your feedback and report any issues to our issue tracker.
.
